instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00244: What is 820-00244? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00244</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no audio
threads.message:
macbook start normaly, work normal but in system preferences no audio card 
<CAPACITOR>C6411</CAPACITOR>,<CAPACITOR>C6421</CAPACITOR>,<CAPACITOR>C6311</CAPACITOR>,<CAPACITOR>C6321</CAPACITOR> - 5,14V

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00244</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no audio
threads.message:
Audio codec is placed on separate board, connected to J6799.
Any fault history available, liquid spill on the audio board?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00244</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> no audio
threads.message: someone before me try to change lcd and broke cable connecting trackpad, and power supply cable, i change them and it start working, maybe its a problem whit connection i will change cable and try again
